de.wwu.muggl.instructions.replaced.quick
Class InvokestaticQuickAbstract

java.lang.Object
  de.wwu.muggl.instructions.general.GeneralInstruction
      de.wwu.muggl.instructions.general.GeneralInstructionWithOtherBytes
          de.wwu.muggl.instructions.replaced.quick.InvokestaticQuickAbstract
All Implemented Interfaces:
JumpException, JumpInvocation, Instruction, QuickInstruction
Direct Known Subclasses:
InvokestaticQuickNative, InvokestaticQuickNormal
public abstract class InvokestaticQuickAbstract
extends GeneralInstructionWithOtherBytes
implements JumpException, JumpInvocation, QuickInstruction

Abstract QuickInstruction for invokestatic. As there are two concrete quick implementations, one for the normal and one for the native invocation, methods and functionality used by both is encapsulated in this class.

Version:
1.0.0, 2010-03-18
Author:
Tim Majchrzak

Constructor Detail

InvokestaticQuickAbstract

InvokestaticQuickAbstract(InvokestaticReplacer replacer,
                          short[] otherBytes,
                          Method method,
                          boolean accSynchronized,
                          int parameterCount)
Construct an instance of this abstract class so the concrete class can inherit functionality.

Parameters:
replacer - The ReplacingInstruction that constructs this.
otherBytes - The additional bytes of the invokestatic instruction replaced by this.
method - The Method to invoke.
accSynchronized - Flag whether the method is synchronized, or not.
parameterCount - The number of parameters passed to the method.

getInvokedMethod

public Method getInvokedMethod(Constant[] constantPool,
                               MugglClassLoader classLoader)
                        throws ClassFileException,
                               ExecutionException
Get a reference to the Method invoked by this instruction.

Specified by:
getInvokedMethod in interface JumpInvocation
Parameters:
constantPool - The constant pool.
classLoader - The current class loader.
Returns:
The resolved Method.
Throws:
ClassFileException - On fatal errors loading or parsing a class file.
ExecutionException - If the method is resolved to be the initializer or the constant pool does not have a symbolic reference to a method at the position encoded in the bytecode.
java.lang.NoSuchMethodError - If the Method could not be found.
